name: Lightning Bolt
oracle_text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

name: Birds of Paradise
oracle_text: Flying\n{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Zurzoth, Chaos Rider
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent draws their first card each turn, if it's not their turn, create a 1/1 red Devil creature token with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."\nWhenever one or more Devils you control attack one or more players, you and those players each draw a card, then discard a card at random.
